statements: DELETE FROM StudentProgress WHERE assessment_name = 'Final Exam';
DELETE FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1 AND assessment_name = 'Midterm';
DELETE FROM StudentProgress WHERE assessment_date < '2022-01-01' AND score > 80;
DELETE FROM Assessments WHERE assessment_id = 100 AND assessment_score > 90;
DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_grade < 70 OR student_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM grades WHERE student_id = 2 AND grade_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM assessments WHERE score < 70 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM grades WHERE student_id = 1001 AND grade_date > '2022-06-01';
